text: Charles Strouse (born June 7, 1928 died May 15, 2025) is an American musician who makes music for movies and television programs. He made the music for Annie and Bye Bye Birdie. He also made the music for All in the Family and Lee Adams made the lyrics for the show. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:American movie score composers Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Living people
title: Charles Strouse
